item.title: Using Docker with R
item.description: Still working out the details of my site, but I thought I would do a quick post on starting a Docker container with shiny-server running on Ubuntu.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi. My name is Bill Ash. I’m an accounting coordinator for a New York based telecom and low voltage integrration company. I enjoy bike racing, accounting, rstats, coffee, and using open source technology to solve problems. I was captain of the Midwestern State University cycling team where I double majored in accounting and finance. I don’t have much to write about. Postings on things I google a lot.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Updates for things that I work on in my free time.
